message:
So you think Amazon is doing a great job delivering your products on the same day? Watch to find out what else does it have in store for you..!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vNySOrI2Ny8
Watch our quad-copter Albatross demonstrating fully autonomous package delivery using GPS waypoints.

message:
Attention First and Second years!!!!
Due to time constraints the first round interviews have been extended till 25 February from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM.

Attention First and Second years!!!!
Due to time constraints the first round interviews have been extended till 25 February from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM.

"For once you have tasted flight you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return. "
Embarking on a journey of thrill and exploration, Aerial Robotics Kharagpur invites all first and second year robotics enthusiasts to join us in the Introductory Seminar.
February 23rd | Kalidas Auditorium | 6 PM
Fill out the form here to register yourself: https://quadrotor-iitkgp.github.io/recruit and tinyurl.com/SwarmSelections2017

Sometimes you need to fly, before you run.

Sometimes you need to fly, before you run.
Catch us live at Global Entrepreneurship summit 2017 at http://a.impartus.com/live/IITK.html

Aerial Robotics Kharagpur will be having a live demonstration and  presentation on the application of drones in India at National Product Expo, Global Entrepreneurship Summit organised by Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur.
Venue: Kalidas Auditorium
Time-stamp: February 03, 2017 | 8:45 PM

PS: The introductory seminar for Aerial Robotics Kharagpur and Swarm, IIT Kharagpur will happen after midsems. Stay tuned for further updates.
